jobDescription: We are a small high end residential and commercial design firm located in the West 30’s seeking an interior designer/ project manager to be involved in all phases of high end residential design, including interior renovations.  Candidate Requirements:  - 4-5 years minimum experience at a NYC based interior design or interior architecture firm; residential experience a plus  - Proficiency in AutoCad  - Experience with working drawings and constructions documents  - Familiarity with furniture/ cabinetry detailing  - Experience in project management and working with General Contractors  - Ability to work independently  - Ability to prioritize among multiple projects/ tasks  - Must be extremely well organized and detail oriented  Salary is by the hour, commensurate with experience.  Please respond and submit resume, including salary requirements and portfolio, directly through Glassdoor.  Candidates without experience at a NYC based design/architecture firm will not be considered.
